post:
Hello guys, 

It's been a while I haven't posted anything on LET.

First, let's congratulate the french team for winning world cup :D, sorry no OVH Deals planned to celebrate this  (@FAT32 ;) )

Back to serious thing, we (OVH) decided to lower our prices on EG-16 dedicated server. 10€ off on all Datacenters, and the NVMe disk option is now at 0€ (as cheap as SATA, option cost 8€ before)

Here specs infos:

CPU:  Intel  Xeon E3-1230v6 - 4c/8t - 3.5GHz /3.9GHz
RAM:  16GB DDR4 ECC 2400MHz
vRack: 1 Gbps
Disk: 2x 450 GB SSD NVMe or 2x4TB SATA

€64.99 ex. VAT/month

Please, feel free to make your feedback about it !

Cheers
